dialogues.text: You can't die!  Tell us what poison you used!  You can't die!  Tell us the antidote!  You can't let Li Mu Bai die!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She used Purple Yin... Purple Yin poison.  It goes straight to the heart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My blood will soon reverse its flow. It's the same poison she used to kill my master.  There is no antidote.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That can't be!  Everything has an antithesis!  Why not this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The antidote exists.  She taught it to me.  The formula is simple, but it takes time to prepare.  Trust me. As you have helped me, let me help you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right.  Hurry.  I will hold on as long as I can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (takes the comb from her hair)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take my horse and go to the compound. Give this to Mrs. Wu.  She'll help you.  Hurry!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spare your energy.  I'll be back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bo is burying Fox in the rain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guards surround Jen.  She pushes past them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is Mrs. Wu? Aunt Wu comes running out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop it! Jen pulls out Yu's comb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shu Lien told me to show you this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let her in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yu sits across from Li, whose pose is almost meditational eerily calm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mu Bai, hold on.  Give me some hope...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shu Lien...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Save your strength.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My life is departing.  I've only one breath left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Use it to meditate.  Free yourself from this world as you have been taught.  Let your soul rise to eternity with your last breath.  Do not waste it... for me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've already wasted my whole life. I want to tell you with my last breath... I have always loved you. I would rather be a ghost, drifting by your side... as a condemned soul... than enter heaven without you.  Because of your love... I will never be a lonely spirit. Yu cries. She kisses him lightly.  He closes his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the sun rises, Jen rides speedily, clutching the medic in her hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Li is in Yu's arms.  They're holding hands.  The sun shin in.  Yu slowly releases Li's stiff fingers -- he is dead. Jen is at the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's gone? Bo peeks over Jen's shoulder. Yu rises and picks up Green Destiny.  Jen kneels.  Yu rai the sword, but doesn't kill her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bo... please take this sword back to Sir Te. He takes the sword from her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Jen)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you must go to Wudan Mountain. Lo awaits you there.  Promise me one thing, whatever path you take in this life... be true to yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jen climbs up toward the temple, finally reaching the tem gate, and sees Lo standing there. He runs to her.  She greets him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jen and Lo make love.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lo wakes up to find the jade comb on the pillow beside hi Jen gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lo catches up to Jen, who stands on a bridge.  The gorges below are shrouded in clouds.  She looks back at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you remember the legend of the young man?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "A faithful heart makes wishes come true."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Make a wish, Lo. Lo pauses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (closing his eyes)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To be back in the desert, together again. Jen smiles, turns, and leaps into the clouds.  They seem catch her gently, before she disappears into them. Lo remains standing, a smile on his face, tears rolling d his cheeks. THE END.
